name: Phpencil
body:
### PHPencil

This is my MVC framework implementation for PHP. Is just my way to learn how frameworks work and the idea is that phpencil is the easiest one to use.

I'll write a better readme and some wiki pages for this project later.
tagline: Simple MVC framework developed just to be shorter than the usual ones.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
